title: How to hack a DVD player to make it play any DVDs regardless of region lock - Quora

response.answer_text: Only some brands of standalone DVD players allow a hack. Typically the minor brands. The procedure varies according to the model and brand of the remote. There are three variations of the exact procedure. They are roughly Enter a multi digit code from the remote control when in a specific mode Use a specially constructed DVD disk Enter a special mode using keys not normally found on the remote. Sometimes found by opening the remote up and access a key not brought out to the remote front panel or by using a universal remote. There are web sites, not referenced here, where you can search your exact make and model for the exact procedure. Use a search engine to locate them. For computer DVD units, you can get software that allows you to “rip” the DVD to disk, change the region code and burn the same DVD with a different region code. It’s a bit of trouble, but I have done this to overcome certain standalone DVD players that I have been unable to remove the region lock.
